185970249.review:
Un excelente juego con una jugabilidad única y divertida. Su enfoque principal no es la historia, y eso es algo que uno debería saber antes de instalarlo, ya que su campaña dura aproximadamente 1,5 a 2 horas.
Su fuerte, sin embargo, es la versatilidad y su estilo de juego, con diferentes desafíos y su modo "endless".
Sumamente recomendado para cuando está en oferta y querés algo diferente y entretenido.

8/10

185889156.review:
[h1]Would You Wanna Leave The Simulation?[/h1]
SUPERHOT is the smash-hit FPS where time moves only when you move. No regenerating health bars. No conveniently placed ammo drops. It's you, alone, outnumbered and outgunned. Snatch weapons from fallen enemies to shoot, slice and dodge through a truly cinematic hurricane of slow-motion bullets.

[url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/ATReviews]Follow My Review Group Here![/url]

[table]
    [tr]
        [th]About[/th]
        [th]Description[/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]💾Graphics[/td]
        [td]Graphics are extremely simple. Mostly filled with a white color with some red’s (Mainly the bullets and enemies are red), but that’s about it. In my opinion, it’s a unique artstyle choice that represents what this game is trying to achieve, and that’s a simulation. Now the environments are pretty detailed, in terms of layout and design. Not much to say here. It’s simple, easy to get used to, and helps you focus on the combat.[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]🎮Gameplay[/td]
        [td]Gameplay is basic, but well executed. This is a shooter/puzzle game, that’s all about surviving. The main mechanic is pure slo-motion, based on your movement speed. It’s kinda like a matrix experience if that makes any sense. It’s “fast pace” pure combat, with the puzzle being you dodging bullets. It’s unique, and I actually really like it. There are many methods in killing your foes. With guns, melee weapons, your fist, or trick the enemy and have them kill their own. You can also teleport in different bodies which is a pretty cool mechanic. Once you beat the game, you unlock a few game modes like endless, and challenges. I just wish the enemies and levels are increasingly harder. Yeah you face enemies with a few different weapons, but that’s about it.[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]📜Story[/td]
        [td]The story was actually engaging! Being addicted to this simulator while the “moderators” watch and warn you about your wrongdoing does heighten the tension a bit. I won’t spoil much, but it was a surprisingly well done story, granted there’s no dialogue and mostly done on text.[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]🕛Playtime[/td]
        [td]Playtime is around 20+ hours if you are doing the extra game modes too. The story alone was around 6+ hours.[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]🎧Sound[/td]
        [td]Sound design is super basic. Honestly just not much to say here. Besides the gunshots, there’s not much else in terms of sound design lol. Now that may be because this is based of a simulation.[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]❗Bugs❗[/td]
        [td]I didn’t see any bugs in this game. No odd glitches or issues. Game ran really well in terms of bugs.[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]🔅Performance[/td]
        [td]Performance was actually super good! There are little to no graphics options, but that doesn’t matter because the game ran perfectly. No stutters, no crashes, and high frame rates![/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]✔️Pro’s[/td]
        [td][list]
	[*]Super fun slow-mo combat
	[*]Fun game modes & challenges
	[*]Story is simple but engaging 
	[*]Unique puzzle-shooter experience
	[*]UI is pretty unique (Computer BIOS style UI)
[/list]
[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]❌Con’s[/td]
        [td][list]
	[*]Super short story
	[*]Levels or enemies don’t really get more complex or harder
[/list]
[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]🏆Rating[/td]
        [td]8/10
Buy this game on sale for around 50% off.[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]🔗Conclusion[/td]
        [td]SUPERHOT surprised me! I knew it was gonna be a fun and unique game, but didn’t expect to get addicted to it for a short while. It was simple, easy to get into, and fairly challenging at times. A great experience if you want to play a super unique shooting game.[/td]
    [/tr]
[/table]

https://store.steampowered.com/app/322500/SUPERHOT/

[*]RAM: 32GB Ram

185868021.review:
The game itself is cool and feels epic thanks to its unique time mechanic.
If you play it carefully, it won't be particularly difficult for you — I would even say it's pretty easy. However, that doesn't mean the game is bad, as it actually gives you the feeling of being a "cool pro agent on a secret mission", partially thanks to levels being not that hard to beat. 
BUT
After only 30 minutes in I have already noticed a couple of really irritating things that worsen my gaming experience:
1) Somehow, this game removes the English keyboard layout from my computer when I launch it.
2) Pressing Escape sends you back to the main menu instead of pausing the game.
3) Restart requires you to hold the R button and shows you screen interference animation every single time which I find really unnecessary and annoying.
4) After completing a level you get to see the replay in normal speed, which is a neat feature. BUT it just keeps spamming "Super Hot" both in my ears and eyes. Sometimes I need to  Alt + Tab after the level and I still hear this crap on repeat. YES you can press F5 after every level, but why did they have to make you do it? it just really is the highest point of stupidity for me. It is the worst thing on the list. 
+ Replays don't have any sounds.
Also I don't care that much about it, but why does it need to have a separate launcher?

185724765.review: SUPERHOT - это та игра, которая реализует мечту многих детей из разряда "Вот бы я мог время замедлять!". Главная механика игры невероятно проста, сама графика незамысловата, но какое же это ошеломительное комбо. В игре есть довольно интригующий СЮЖЕТ, на который можно спокойно не обращать внимания, если вы здесь, чтобы стрелять и потрошить красных чубриков. Понравилось. как вы аннигилировали уровень за пару секунду и хотите показать миру то, насколько вы скилловый игрок? Милости просим - разработчики сделали целый сайт Killterest.com, на который можно заливать повторы своих лучших прохождений. Надоело месить одни и те же уровни? Вас ждет десяток разнообразных карт бесконечного режима и десяток испытаний, которые позволят по другому взглянуть на игру и ещё больше разнообразить ваш стиль игры. В общем и целом: игра - великолепна, к покупке - рекомендую, SUPER - HOT.

185680404.review:
[h1]TL;DR[/h1]

[b]TL;DR:[/b] I wouldn't describe this game as a shooter but rather a puzzle game - which is something I can appreciate but unfortunately the game fails incredibly to feel rewarding due to the missing demand of sophisticated solutions. The level design and enemy placement is so trivial that it gets fairly hard to fail.


[h1]Pros:[/h1]
[list]
[*] Fantastic idea for a puzzle game
[*] Challenges and Endless mode do provide challenges - unfortunately in a fairly repetitive manner
[*] Modest visuals
[/list]

[h1]Cons:[/h1]
[list]
[*] Insanely annoying noises as well as voices
[*] Disgusting visuals and transitions between levels or within the Options
[*] The entire game is basically an infinite flash bang and you most likely have to select a low brightness mode on your monitor
[*] Gameplay loop is very repetitive and boring
[*] Fails to be a proper puzzle game (see TL;DR above)
[*] It is rather hard to read the movement of your enemies. Their entire body can scream they are about to change directions by 90° and proceed to not to while at the same time other enemies run towards you in full sprint, just to stop in an instant and run backwards without some kind of inertia. To be fair you can do the same. But once this mechanic is combined with the extremely slow bullet speed in comparison to movements it actually is one of the few shooter where I do struggle to hit headshots. Enemies may do a step or not. They may change directions or not. So instead of a potential fantastic puzzle game you get a very tedious enemy check. "Did I hit enemy 1? Did I hit enemy 2? Did I hit enemy 3? ..." over and over again.
[*] Story is fairly bland and barely existent
[*] Performance is meh ~140fps but you also don't really need more
[/list]

🎮 Вперше познайомився з цією грою на VR, у версії для Meta Quest 3. І досі вважаю що це одна з кращих ігор для віртуальної реальності. Вона яскрава, зрозуміла та крута. 

Після VR захотілось познайомитись з першоджерелом і воно також гарне. Звичайно є певні обмеження (наприклад не можна присідати), але в цілому гра відчувається кайфово. Прикольна шутер/головоломка на декілька годин. На мій подив - сюжет також присутній і для такої короткої гри він навіть прикольний і досить пропрацьований. 

Гарно. Незвичайно. Прикольно. Рекомендую.

P.S. Версію для VR рекомендую ще більше, якби не вона то я б і в цю не спробував ❤

Вот такие звуки обычно и можно услышать в игре, которая поразила многих своей уникальной идеей, интересной подачей и схожесть с Max Payne и Matrix. 'Время движется, когда ты движешься" - говорят создатели этой игры, называя...

🔫⚔️ Superhot⏱️💢

...стратегией, а не шутером

🎮 Поначалу игрок даже не понимает в чём прикол игры. Бегаешь, замедляешь время, бьёшь противника или стреляешь в него, он умирает и так далее. Однако всё не так просто со стороны сюжета. Да, сюжет присутствует

🗡Игра начинается на экране командной строки DOS. Безликий друг присылает безликому главному герою игру-пиратку и... весь остальной сюжет можно пройти или прочитать в Википедии

⚔️Игра выступает шутером-стратегией с видом от первого лица, поскольку действия происходят в виртуальной реальности. Игра данное произведение искусства- даже не искусство. Но можно своими действиями воплотить в игру искусство

🫥мой метод: всё что нужно - очень красиво побеждать врагов + не застревать в текстурах. Если после победы вам понравился ваш "танец", то можно сохранить видео на жёсткий диск или же выложить его на сайт разработчика игры

🐂Также имеются испытания и мясорубка бесконечный режим. Некоторые пасхальные яйца в меню тоже присутствуют. Например, можно включить песочные часы, сделанные символами

😑Много про эту игру не попишешь по причине того, что смысл только в непредсказуемости действий игрока. Рекомендую играть только на ПК, поскольку на геймпаде не получится исполнить танец смерти красных человечков

Its visual style is very unique enemies, items easily contrasted from the sparsely detailed but still interesting environments. A game worth playing despite its short playtime, because its levels are all finely made and mechanics perfected.

185208816.review: Najbardziej innowacyjny shooter w jaki kiedykolwiek grałem. Gameplay jest przyjemny i sprawia dużo funu a mechanika manipulowania czasem wpasowuje się tutaj idealnie. Czasem trochę denerwujące jest to że kiedy potrzebujesz amunicji to się kończy i trzeba ją pozyskać z broni przeciwników lub podnieść którąś z mapy. Fabuła jest tutaj prosta (choć ja nie zwracam na nią szczególnej uwagi). Jeśli chodzi o grafikę to też jest dosyć prosta, bo występują tutaj tylko trzy palety kolorów - biały oznaczający mapę, czarny oznaczający bronie i pięści i czerwony oznaczający przeciwników. 185060114.review:
Я прошел сюжетную линию этой игры за 3ч и вот что могу сказать: это отличный шутер с интересной задумкой. Сначала может показаться, что это просто убивалка времени, но со временем появляется сюжет, который мне лично понравился.

Все уровни тут довольно простые, кроме последнего. Там я полагался исключительно на рандом.

Понравилось и то, что после прохождения основного сюжета в игре появляется бесконечный режим с большим количеством разных арен, интересные испытания на время и не только, что заставляет провести в SUPERHOT еще чуток времени.

185036663.review:
슈퍼핫을 플레이하기 전에 트레일러와 게임 설명을 봤을때는

액션도 다이나믹하고 내가 움직일때만 시간이 간다고 하니 

엄청 스타일리시 하고 도파민 터지는 스피디한 액션이 기다리고 있을거라는 이미지였지만

 

막상 플레이 해보니 총알 하나 날라오는거 맞기 싫어서 야금야금 움직이게되고

밸런싱을 위해서겠지만 총기류의 장전이 느린편이라 한발 한발의 에임도 신중하게 쏴야되서

게임의 속도는 더더욱 느려지게 된다.

 

그리고 게임을 멈춰가면서 플레이 했던 것을 

스테이지 클리어를 하고 나면 실시간으로 이어서 리플레이를 보여주는데

빠르게 보면 엄청 멋있겠지? 라는 예상과는 달리 복잡한 동작을 빠르게 수행할때를 제외하고는

평범한 FPS 화면과 크게 다르지 않았다.

 

물론 게임에 익숙하거나 컨트롤이 좋은 사람은 이리저리 날라오는 총알들을 피해가면서

스피디한 액션을 즐기는 방법도 있겠지만, 라이트 하게즐기는 사람이 

그렇게 도파민을 찾다가는 어디서 날라오는지 모르는 총알 한대 맞고

스테이지 시작으로 돌아갈 뿐이기 때문에

그게 싫어서라도 다시 쫄보플레이로 돌아가게 된다.

 

게임화면만 봤을때는 전혀 기대하지 않았던 세계관이나

이야기의 진행은 오히려 나쁘지 않았던 

슬로우 액션 시뮬레이터.

184228076.review:
[h1] Superhot[/h1]

Superhot is, without a doubt, one of the most original and innovative first-person shooters of the past decade. It transcends the traditional concept of a "game," creating an experience that blends intense action, philosophical reflection, and a unique aesthetic to challenge our relationship with time, control, and violence.

[h3] Gameplay: A Dance of Strategy and Precision [/h3]
The core mechanic of Superhot is as simple as it is transformative: time only moves when you do. This brilliant idea turns the FPS genre into something closer to a strategic puzzle, where every movement and decision must be meticulously calculated. The sensation of "frozen time" amplifies the tension of each encounter, offering a nearly meditative experience amidst the chaos.

The minimalist visual style – vibrant red enemies, black weapons, and stark white environments – is more than an aesthetic choice. It heightens the sense of isolation and existential dread that permeates the game, emphasizing each action as part of a broader narrative that compels us to question our motivations.

[h3]The Player as the Experiment[/h3]
Superhot is more than just an action game. It serves as a metatextual critique of the player's role in virtual systems, exploring concepts like Pavlovian conditioning and free will. The game frequently breaks the fourth wall to remind the player that they are trapped in a cycle of violence and repetition, one they do not fully control.

The most striking expression of this critique comes in the final music track, which perfectly encapsulates the theme of Pavlovian conditioning. The hypnotic and almost ceremonial repetition of "Superhot, Superhot" creates a visceral association. It’s a chilling reminder of how the game trains the player, rewarding violent objectives and solidifying the phrase as a psychological trigger.

[h3]Short Campaign, Long-Lasting Impact [/h3]
Though the main campaign is relatively short, Superhot offers extra modes and challenges that ensure high replayability. Each attempt reveals new ways to optimize movements and strategies, deepening the experience and amplifying the impact of its narrative and gameplay.

[h3]Conclusion[/h3]
Superhot is more than a game; it’s an interactive work of art that redefines the FPS genre and challenges its conventions. Its innovative mechanics, thought-provoking narrative, and philosophical reflections on control and violence create a unique and deeply impactful experience.

The final music track serves as the culmination of this journey, perfectly encapsulating the Pavlovian conditioning players undergo – not just within the game, but in the very dynamic between players and interactive media.

Superhot isn’t just [u] the most innovative shooter you’ll play this year [/u] it’s an experience that will linger with you long after the final screen.

183996173.review:
Rating: ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
A brilliant idea that doesn't work.

The game is built around the single game mechanic where time only moves when you move. It's a fantastic new take on the beloved bullet time that Max Payne introduced back in 2001, and nobody has ever iterated on since. Sadly, despite how fun it sounds, it's not. It's only two hours long, and the game grows dull even before that. I believe a lot more could have been done with the levels or enemy variety. The story is okay, but it feels really forced. Worth at a discount.
